abstract: Drawing 20.6 million viewers on Sunday, “Desperate Housewives” lifted ABC into first place for the night’s ratings, according to Nielsen’s estimates. The 9 p.m. drama delivered the largest audience of the night, easily outperforming NBC’s “Sunday Night Football” which averaged 13 million viewers.
lead_paragraph: Drawing 20.6 million viewers on Sunday, “Desperate Housewives” lifted ABC into first place for the night’s ratings, according to Nielsen’s estimates. The 9 p.m. drama delivered the largest audience of the night, easily outperforming NBC’s “Sunday Night Football” which averaged 13 million viewers.
